resources.string: Do you want to learn the java language but don\'t want to spend so much time flipping through manuals? With this book , you can quickly grasp the basics of java and handle built-in data structures and functions. Next, you will build your own web application, research database management, exception handling, and data conversion. If you want to know what can be done with context managers, modifiers, derivations, and generators, you can find them all in this book. This book will provide a complete learning experience that will help you quickly become a java programmer.
This course is very interesting. The teacher\'s lectures are witty and humorous, and I have learned a lot about java from them.
